Headline: #28 Stony Island Temporary Southbound Reroute near I-94 Exit Ramp/103rd
ShortDescription: SB 28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted via Stony Island, 95th, Cottage Grove and 103rd, due to street blockage near I-94 Exit Ramp/103rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted via Stony Island, 95th, Cottage Grove and 103rd, due to street blockage near I-94 Exit Ramp/103rd.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
